website_summaries.verdict: A good substitute for a heating pad, this rubber hot water bottle is good for treating multiple injuries and features a colorful knitted cover.
pros: Great for heating of feet, and can be used in the comfort of your bed because it stays warm for a long period of time
cons: Knitted covers don't last that long and need to be replaced

customer_reviews.title: Price vs quality good but still looking for better.
customer_reviews.text: Over all a pretty good price for what it is. While I am relatively happy with these... I don't care for the clear material they are made from. It doesn't release the heat as well as other non-rubber hot water bottles I have used and it's not as conformable to get your cold feet "into." The cover is really nice but is already pilling, i.e. fuzz balls forming after only a couple of weeks. I hope it doesn't wear out quickly. It looks like the bottle itself will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the bottle only worked properly once. It sprung a leak on the second time through a small hole in the bottom. The return date had passed. Not sure if this is common or if I ordered a defective one. Either way, I'm pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Even those of us who don't understand physics can use it!
customer_reviews.text: This item makes me feel like I could be warm and cozy even if I were a thin, pale novelist, bundling myself into my Nan's 100 year old bed in my drafty cliffside cottage with naught but a thin wool blanket for warmth. Even my pup snuggles with it! Two notes: one, I would not advise trying to fill this on, say, a tiny sink where the bottle is squished so that the water is flung about instead of being funneled into the bottle the way mother nature intended. Two, and this may be obvious to most customers, but do dress the bottle in its natty sweater BEFORE filling it. Because physics.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia704

customer_reviews.title: Only one cover will actually fit the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy, I didn’t feel like I needed to be careful for it to not leak or pop, but doesn’t hold heat for more than 3-4 hours. The sweater fits over it fine, but the second cover, there is no way that one will fit. I bought it because it had a second cover and I’m pretty disappointed that it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer29109

customer_reviews.title: Helpful instruction / warnings
customer_reviews.text: There were no useful manufacturer's instructions on methods of heating/re-heating the water in the bottle, as with a microwave. I thought that would be possible for at least 20 - 30 seconds rather than draining the bottle, otherwise reheating, then refilling. The bottle was well designed but the manufacturer should understand the materials and the need for practical consumer instruction/warnings relating to product safety.
customer_reviews.author: DLDmny

customer_reviews.title: First time owner and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hot water bottle I have purchased and I love it! I typically use heating pads for cramps but was getting annoyed with the cord and having to turn it on and off. This water bottle stays hot all night long! So much more convenient than having a cord and I love that I can even stick it at the foot of my bed for some added warmth! The sweater looks pretty goofy, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colored sweater
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the opportunity to use the hot water bottle yet. The hot water bottle is clear not pink like shown and it took some searching to find the instructions not to use oiling water. Instructions are in the nozzle area of the bottle. The cover is fairly thick and mildly hot water might not be felt through the cover. The cover was true to to the color described and looks and feels like a sweater dickie. I am anxious to try it out on my arthritic knee.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Plastic material too easy to damage
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine if you’re very careful not to overheat it by accident—especially when you’re reheating it after use, when it’s not down to room temp yet but you want it warmer. I misjudged the time on the microwave, and it bubbled near the neck of the bottle, formed a hole, and leaked. Luckily, thanks to the sweater cover, I noticed that it was leaking before grabbing it and risking getting burned. I’m switching over to a rubber one.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Durable, doesn’t leak, and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle is fantastic! I don’t use the sweater cover because I like the temperature as hot as I can stand. The plastic is not rough or hard. I’ve been using this 1-2 times a day since beginning of November to help with an injury and the water bottle is still in great condition! It doesn’t leak, hasn’t ripped or molded, and does exactly what I need it to do which is act as a hot pack for an injury recovery. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: E Clay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is incredible. I initially bought for cramps but I've started taking it to bed with me at night and the water is still warm when I empty it out in the morning! I have the knitted cover on it which is nice and cozy. Look no further, this is the water bottle you need.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy piece & gives lasting warmth
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase! Had major surgery a month and a half ago, and after the first couple of weeks, I was cleared to start using this...helped so much with the soreness. For regular use, it’s pretty comforting to have this warming my bedlinen before I turn in. Stands up well to high temperatures of boiling water poured in immediately from my kitchen’s kettle, and stays warm for at least a couple hours afterwards. I sometimes lie down with part of my body on it to ease some aching muscles and limbs, and so far it’s held up well to my body weight that way.
customer_reviews.author: Malavika Sasikumar

customer_reviews.title: Durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and functional. I find that in order to get it warm enough to be useful you have to heat water up on the stove, just using hot water from the tap isn't warm enough at all. Bought it mainly to keep around on cold nights in the bed near my feet when they get cold, but also for pain relief. Seems OK so far. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice hot water bottle! The material is thick and it doesn't feel like the seams will break with regular use and that's most important. The raised markings on the sides make the heat transfer more diffused and that's really nice with the addition of the cover/sweater. I love the little sweater, it prevents it from burning me and makes it such a delight to snuggle with. I thought it might be a little thin when I first looked at it but it seems to do exactly what it needs to do: transmit heat but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: E. Love

customer_reviews.title: Great Low-Tech Performance
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the old fashioned solutions are the best. This water bottle is durable, portable, and stays warm a long time. Best discovery: I can use it in the car on long trips. The bottle gives additional lumbar support while also providing heat therapy. I can refill it from the hot water in the coffee dispensers at truck stops.
customer_reviews.author: Camille in GA

customer_reviews.title: Great to be frozen too!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! When the weather was supremely hot where we live (i.e., it broke all-time high temp records) and since we don't have A/C or even an evaporative cooler, we actually filled them with water and froze them, and then slept with them on our chests. It worked great! It added a bit of cool to the indoor temperatures of 92*F. The coverings are both soft, with the "woven" one better for this when frozen, but we could see using either one if we wanted it to be hot.
customer_reviews.author: SFC

customer_reviews.title: Good water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Good water bottle- I use them for outdoor cat shelters when it's freezing outside. So far, it withstands very hot water. I heat water to just below a simmer and let it sit for a minute. I fill it without needing to remove the knit cover easily. So far, they have held up well and the cats seem to like them!
customer_reviews.author: ERN

customer_reviews.title: Pain away
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I've always tried the heating pads that you peel off and stick to your back from the Pharmacy but usually ended up in the Emergency room for pain because they didn't work. The water bottle just eased the pain away, don't know why I didn't think of it before, I remembered them as a child, my grandson laughed, had never saw one before (some old school works, this is one)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: It's great that it comes with the Knit cover since we heat up the water for too high temperature (so that it stays warm). If it's too hot, we put the cover on and when the warmth goes away a bit, we take the knit cover off so we can use it for longer.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very good, but quite large. It fits over my whole abdomen when I use it for cramps. It take about half of my tea kettle to fill, and I don't usually fill it all the way. It's a little difficult to fill with water (especially hot) but the sleeve definitely helps. It's rather cute. I'm using it for cramps, and I won't say it works wonders, but it's helping a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cas Crim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to fill and to see how much water there is. I did not use the covers after the first fill but recommend put it on before filling is easiest. Another tip- wipe around inside of lip before inserting stopper! I like it for my osteoarthritis, an old-fashioned comfort remedy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle saves me every night!!! Me feet are very cold all of the time and I cannot fall asleep with cold feet. This bottle is amazing - takes seconds to fill it up and it stays hot for a long time. I usually do out use the cover. But it’s not too difficult to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hot Water Bottles. Period.
customer_reviews.text: These beauties have been outstanding. The ability to retain heat, down to a warmish level even when waking after a night's sleep, is off the charts and unmatched in my other experiences. The three star rating on pain is only because I don't use it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: very cute + functional
customer_reviews.text: honestly this is my first hot water bottle -- and I have used it several times and like it! I have played around with the volume and temperature of the water I'm putting in it, and it's held up very well so far - no busted seams or any melting, even though I wouldn't be surprised if I overfilled it a time or two. plus the sweater that it comes with is awfully cute.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.  Never Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Another use is to rest it against your lower back while you sleep if you have had a strenuous day. Helps the muscles to relax gor hours. Another feature I've not seen mentioned is how quickly it empties. I'm not sure how it works, but you don't get that 'chug-chug-chug' like emptying a 2 liter. It pours out in 2-3 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: C Copperpot

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it with the knitted cover. Could have skipped the cover. Fill the thing with hot to almost boiling water and it’s perfect. I use it for cold feet to warm my bed at night, mentrural cramp relief, back and neck pain (work). My cats love it too and always find it between my feet and sleep on it. It stays warm for a LONG time under flannel sheets (12+hrs).
customer_reviews.author: Brianna P

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: This does it's job well. I just used this today and it keeps the heat for a long time. Living through the Michigan winter, sometimes I need this to give me a little extra warmth throughout the day and night. I will also keep these in mind for gifts to my friends who also have to deal with this freezing weather. I would recommend this 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: My mom always has cold hands and feet due to blood thinner. I fill in the morning to use during the day and fill at night for her bed. She loves it. Sturdy and doesn't leak. Covered with its own sweater and maintains heat all day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and can't stop using it. I am pregnant and my kidney always get really sore and so it helps to keep them really warm. I find if I leave the sleeve on it, you can't feel the warmth. Maybe if I boiled the water but I just take the sleeve off and it works great. It stays warm for a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: A blast from the past.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these, blue and burgundy. They came in handy for my sister who had been ill. They gave her much needed warmth, and the knit sweaters were comforting. They sealed well so there was no worry of leakage. And because it's an old school method, there's no electrical cord involved. They'd also be suitable to be used with ice for injuries.
customer_reviews.author: saved my life

customer_reviews.title: No more cold feet!
customer_reviews.text: This winter has been SO cold, and my feet feel like they are always pretty much blocks of ice. I pop this under my covers a few minutes before bed and voila, no more cold feet! I love the covers too. The printed one is super soft and the sweater one looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love using a hot water bottle to relieve pain, but mostly to warm up the bed on cold nights. This is a lovely bottle - great quality and the knit cover is beautiful. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. This is exactly what I wanted for swelling and shoulder pain. I love the option of having 2 covers, instead of 1. Depending on your skin type, you can use flannel or woolen option. The water bottle is holding HOT water well. You do not want to pour boiling water into it, however wait for 10 mins for water to cool down before pouring into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: zee

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Hot Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love that this bottle has a "sweater" sleeve and it prevents the bottle from sliding and help to keep water hot longer. Besides, the "sweater" feels better when applying. Before I wrapped my hot bottles into a towel and with this extra feature I don't need to use anything else. I had a concern how would I fill up the bottle without making the "sweater" wet. I just took the "sweater" cover off while filling up or pouring out the water and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: does not hold heat for 8 hours, more like 5-6.
customer_reviews.text: I like the construction of the bottle, it's durable, practical, and just the right size but the fleece sleeve is strange. I hate the knit one, but that's just personal preference. It holds heat well enough, but not as well as advertised. My only complaint is that it doesn't hold heat through the night. I wake up to a bottle barely above room temperature at 4 in the morning. not fun. I put very hot water in the bottle too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my period cramps. It really works and holds the heat really good also I sleep with it and still hasn’t burst or spilled so I highly recommend. Also the sweater is super soft and prevents you from burning.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for my SO with her monthly cramps. The bag came with a cute and soft sweater, which is very neat. Fills up a decent amount of water and stays warm for the night (we use water boiled from water kettle).
customer_reviews.author: Javk5pakfa

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I've been using it all day to keep my feet warm! I can never get my feet to warm up in the winter even with all the socks, blankets, and house shoes. I can't go to sleep if my feet are cold so this has helped! It has a rubber scent when you first get it out of the packaging but once it has the cover on it you don't smell anything. I prefer the pawprint cover because IT'S SO SOFT!! All in all this was a great purchase and I'm happy it helps my ice cubes I call feet!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Martin

customer_reviews.title: warmth
customer_reviews.text: To me, buying a hot water bottle means more than just hot water bottle. It means sending warmth to a person you care about.But the many bottles I have bought (and failed), this one is good because my receiving end was happy. Good size, and all that a good bottle holds. As for durability, I will write further when buying my next one.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: My best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute must for anybody struggling with sore body parts. Bad cramps and back aches are much easier to manage this way and I don't have to worry about falling asleep with this hot water bottle. Going on 2.5 years with this bottle and it has never leaked on me. Also helpful for warming up chilly feet during long midwestern winters. I dont use the cover frequently, but that is just my own preference. There is nothing wrong with the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to somebody who was looking for your average ...
customer_reviews.text: The covers can be difficult to get on and off the bottle and tend to get a bit wet when filling the bottle. The sweater gets stretched out within one or two uses. Overall, I would recommend this to somebody who was looking for your average hot water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing now
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these in my bed. I fill them with hot tap water an hour before I go to bed. I keep my bedroom very cold to conserve energy costs so it’s really nice to get into my cozy warm bed at night. I find that they stay warm until morning. I think the sweater helps keep the heat in. It makes me look forward to going to bed
customer_reviews.author: janette pilkington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect traditional water bottle for hot water
customer_reviews.text: This traditional water bottle works great, and the washable sweater cover keeps the bottle feeling cozy when hot water is used in the water bottle. My daughter uses it when she has a stomach ache and it really helps to soothe when medicine is not the right option.
customer_reviews.author: B!

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle with cute cozy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely stays hot, but the cute cozy seems to not let the heat out (and putting the really hot water through the bag is too hot!). I'm still working on the best material to insulate, but this is a quality product, and seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My old school red rubber hot water bottle finally died so I decided to branch out and get this one. It's slightly smaller than I was used to, but works well. the covers are really useful and the white/blue one is SUPER SOFT! Kinda prefer the larger volume one I had before, but all in all a decent purchase for the price. I do LOVE the covers, the're super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Needham

customer_reviews.title: Be careful in the first filling
customer_reviews.text: No leaks. Mantains hot temperature for a long time. Just be careful the first time that you fill it because the inner walls tend to become adherent between themselves. I recommend filling it the first time with cold water just to detach the inner walls.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Good hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle stays hot for a while, at least 4 hours, its easy to fill, and so far, no leaks! Its actually way easier to fill then the traditional red rubber ones, there's less splash back at the opening. I use it in bed, and in the morning its still ever so slightly warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Stayed warm all night!
customer_reviews.text: While visiting the NM mountains, the weather turned very cold. This product kept us warm all night! AmaTx
customer_reviews.author: amatex

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does not leak and keeps the heat. Only comment, mouth is a tad narrow: needs a funnel to fill it without wetting the woolly wrap.
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: Too thick to GET HOT...
customer_reviews.text: This 'knit cover' over the hot water bottle is a cute gimmick, but that's all it is. The fact is, the hot water bottle is too thick in the first place (without the cover) to get or stay hot! It just doesn't compare at all with the standard red rubber bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Douglass Dumbrille

customer_reviews.title: Everyone (who lives in a cold climate) should own one
customer_reviews.text: Game changer in the winter. Microwave some water, fill the bottle, put it in the sweater (otherwise you fun the risk of getting it wet and wet wool isn't great on your feet all night), put it under the covers in your bed and wait maybe 5-mins. Once you get in, you'll never worry about cold feet ever. Depending on how hot the water is, it can keep relatively warm for 8+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: James C Huessy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used this water bottle several times now. Its not showing any wear yet, and transfers the heat well. I love that it came with a choice of two covers as well, giving me three options of use with it. Personally I actually don't use the covers, but I still love that I have them IF I want to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessimi Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hot water bottle! Perfect for this girl who's always too cold. :) The sweater is soft and fairly durable and makes the water bottle so cute! The water bottle stays pretty warm for a while and I can't live through the winter without it. :) I'd highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherFlower

customer_reviews.title: Just loved these. I got one for me and one ...
customer_reviews.text: Just loved these. I got one for me and one for my husband. Hard to find around where we live and never with a cover so I was thrilled. I have used it hot or cold when needed and it never leaked.
customer_reviews.author: M.LewisTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Great durability!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Great material and helps with my pain relief. I will recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Nika A.

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, holds the water and heat well, I enjoyed and my husband did as well. I used it for my cramps, he used it, for lower back pain, lifting wrong at work. It help.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelywomen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles . Very secure top. Easy to fill. Warm me up in cold night.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: hate it... don't get it..buy a better thicker rubber
customer_reviews.text: crappy doesn't heat up proper and gets cold too fast..buy a proper thick rubber one..this sucks..worst buy
customer_reviews.author: Anshika Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent item
customer_reviews.text: Looks as it does in the picture haven’t used it yet got it for my c section coming up
customer_reviews.author: Shelisa

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle has withstood some high heat and even my 8 year old daughter standing on it while it was filled. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Humes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the outside packaging was dry the contents inside was wet this gave me a bit of a scare. I was unsure if this was a quality control procedure to test the bottle or what so I remove the covering and washed them before using it. The rubber seems extremely durable it makes me feel safe against burns. The cover-ups however are a little lacking.The top portion should be longer to conceal the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Humble

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I love this and use it all the time on my neck and back. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases ever. If you use the thicker cable cover, it stays warm forever. I like to put very hot water (I boil and wait until the water isn’t boiling but still very hot) in before bed and tuck it near my feet, and I was surprised to find that it was still warm when I woke up the next morning! Super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn French

customer_reviews.title: not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: it was impossible to load any ice cubes into the water bottle there were no instructions with the water bottle to determine its proper use. going under the assumption that you would put ice in the bottle for pain relief there was not enough room for the ice cubes to fit - even crushed up and the sides of the bottle did not separate so it was really useless
customer_reviews.author: Don Seubert

customer_reviews.title: Cute color but leaks during use
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to use but the top does not seal well and can sometimes leak. This causes issues for my 93 yr old mother. Update Jan 2018:sometime leak has become leak during every use. Had to retire from use. Sad
customer_reviews.author: J. McL

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Warmth in a Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Have to say that I completely LOVE my Tech hot water bottle! The cover looks and feels like a cozy sweater and keeps the water battle nice and toasty for quite awhile! Stays sealed - no leakage! Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: durable material, no leak whatsoever, the knitted cover is super soft and nice. totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Rezvanifar

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. You need to buy it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ROB LO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Have had it for months and not a single leak.
customer_reviews.text: Such thick plastic that even my mad cat can't chomp through it. Absolutely invaluable during my period. Large enough to cover the whole torso area. Also large enough to put both feet on. Has never leaked once, even when I fall asleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. The amount of heat it retains is surprising, come morning it’s still slightly warm after 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S Berghorst

customer_reviews.title: does its purpose...
customer_reviews.text: works really well. just enough heat to warm you up while sleeping esp with the cloth covers on. hot water stay hot long enough. will recommend. do not use on little kids...
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the cover and used it for pain and warm myself
customer_reviews.author: michael  andah

customer_reviews.title: So warm
customer_reviews.text: I spend allot of nights in hotels on the road... this thing is my new best friend for back issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and cute sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a nice old fashioned hot water bottle for a while, and this is exactly what I wanted. It's a good size, feels sturdy and comes with a cute little sweater cover. It seems to be very good quality and I anticipate this lasting a long time. Overall very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CT Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not a “HOT” water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on other reviews but I have to disagree with them. This bottle is merely luke warm at best even with the hottest tap water. I would not recommend if you’re looking for real heat, going back to the classic red rubber type.
customer_reviews.author: A. H

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I never thought to buy a water bottle for bed until a ran across these on amazon. They are amazing. I put under covers in bed 15 minutes before getting in and perfectly warm cozy temp. Stays warm all night! Great price. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rummell

customer_reviews.title: Good heat retention
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit smaller than I expected, but otherwise just fine.
customer_reviews.author: drMolly

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. Doesn't leak (at least, it hasn't yet, which I'm calling good since every other I've tried from stores seem to have had issues).
customer_reviews.author: D & K Pike

customer_reviews.title: Stayed hot for hours!
customer_reviews.text: First I loved that it came with two covers. Second it stayed hot for hours. My daughter and I both love it.
customer_reviews.author: jhoff

customer_reviews.title: My mom uses it more
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice for cramps and it worked super duper well then my mom asked to use and now she been using it more than me and she also loves it helps a lot with her neck the cover is a soft material and the heat warms up the cover well
customer_reviews.author: britney

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Havent used the cover yet. But this one is a great item. Best for pain relief like back ache. Don't need super hot water, can work with moderate hot water, so tap water works !! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Embee

customer_reviews.title: Low price, Two covers. Won't beat it
customer_reviews.text: Some retailers can overcharge for something as simple as a hot water bottle. This is a good bottle with two quality covers at low price. You won't find a better deal on a water bottle and covers, and won't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D Markowski

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned hot water bottle, with hard to use cover
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it is a hot water bottle. Dinging it a star because ithe covers were a bit of a pain to take on and off, and drying its insides was next to impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Kevino

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Came in so hand I love it I have used a heating pad but I’m just scared of the electric situation so I ordered this. I use it on my pelvic area due to cramps from pcos and I’m telling you it feels amazing
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill and retains heat for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill and retains heat for a long time. After putting boiling water in and slipping the sweater on, the bottle remained hot to warm for 2+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Belle

customer_reviews.title: My coworker recommended that I purchase this for cramps
customer_reviews.text: My coworker recommended that I purchase this for cramps. I was told that if I filled it up about half-way it would sort of mold to your tummy and stay warm for hours. It definitely lived up to my expectations, and really helped ease some of the pain. The little 'turtle neck' it came with was really insulating, but also extremely cute.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this water bottle. Love love love it. Biggest plus it is doesn't smell like rubber like the other bottles I got!
customer_reviews.author: ucon4483

customer_reviews.title: Good hot water bottle at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great water bottle. We had a hard time keeping the "cozy" attached, but found that the bottle is just fine without the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jack98110

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome hot water bottle. And the covers are even different fabrics, which is awesome. I used one cover when I wanted gentle heat, and the other when I wanted a higher level of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R-T

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Old school hot pack without a cord. It stays hot for a long time. Makes my tummy happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hope

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping cold feet warm in bed during the winter! Love the sweater-type covering!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it was going to be small but it was huge and fit a cross my stomach. Last night I went to sleep with this item and this morning the water was still warm. What a great investment for cramps, any pain issues
customer_reviews.author: leaticia

customer_reviews.title: Nicer! Hot water bottle for health needs and value!😊
customer_reviews.text: Very useful its transparency makes refills easy to do! Lov😊 the 2 pc covers that come with it as well!
customer_reviews.author: My Customer Review...

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hot water bottle. The covers are very soft. I love that the bottle is transparent so you can see how much water is in it. Holds heat very well, I'm surprised when it is still lukewarm in the morning when I wake up. Great product
customer_reviews.author: melissacaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm feet
customer_reviews.text: Got back from a trip to Ecuador where they used these to warm the bed. Love the idea and now use it in the cooler months. No more cold feet.
customer_reviews.author: owler

customer_reviews.title: Received used product
customer_reviews.text: I received the item today and the cover has lots of white feathery fluff on it. Looks like a used product.
customer_reviews.author: yuliang419

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used one of these before and I'm so glad I decided to buy one. This helps tremendously with cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Olesijuk

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and I like the cover keeps me from having to use rags ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and I like the cover keeps me from having to use rags ect to protect my skin.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Mom. She says it worked for her cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne L.

customer_reviews.title: This hot water bottle is excellent for warming up the bed and keeping your feet ...
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle is excellent for warming up the bed and keeping your feet warm for a long time. I haven't measured the time, but I would estimate that it holds the heat for at least three hours. I fill it with the hottest water from the tap (ours is pretty hot) and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I use it to keep me cool at night with no AC
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I use it to keep me cool at night with no AC. Holds up with plenty of cycles in and out of the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T.

product_meta.title: All one tech Transparent Classic Rubber Hot Water Bottle with Knit Cover - Blue
feature_bullets: MULTI FUNCTIONAL HOT WATER BOTTLE RUBBER- Thermoplastic material is recyclable. Advanced thermoplastic holds heat longer than traditional rubber bottles, also works as an ice pack, or cold water bottle.

EASY TO USE- Wide mouth is easy to fill and the anti spurt lip prevent water spitting back out like those old rubber ones. Fill only to two-thirds capacity maximum. It's transparent. No more guesswork about how much hot water is inside.

HELPFUL ASSISTANT- The classic design of this classic home remedy. Treating sore muscles, stress or cramps, arthritis, aches and pains, stiff necks, lower back pain, menstrual cramps and other common aches and and can also double up as a cold compress for kids with fever or to reduce swelling for minor injuries.

CARE INSTRUCTION- Grid texture makes skin contact safer and more comfortable. Comes with an elegant knitted hot water bag cover to prevent the hot rubber from being in direct contact with your skin to cause burns, plus it has a more classy and personalized look. The hot water bottle rubber.should be replaced after two years of use. And check stopper for wear and tear damage at regular intervals.
